trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML 웹 서비스에 추가 되는 확장성 요소를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, the `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension` class allows users to define extensibility elements in addition to those defined in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서의 `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension` 클래스는 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 사양에 정의 된 권한과 함께 확장성 요소를 정의할 수 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Extensibility elements can be added to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> at any of several levels within the class hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 확장성 요소에 추가할 수는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>의 클래스 계층 구조 내에서 여러 수준에서.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: Thus many classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem> class (including the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class) have an `Extensions` property, which returns a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서에서 파생 된 많은 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem>클래스 (포함 하는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>클래스)가는 `Extensions` <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection> 를 반환 하는 속성</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> class.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is used by the import process when the extensibility element is imported.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> 확장성 요소를 가져올 때 가져오기 프로세스에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A derived class, representing an extensibility element added to an XML Web service, can be attached to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> by using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A> method (which is used by the wsdl.exe tool).
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스는 XML 웹 서비스에 추가 되는 확장성 요소를 나타내는에 연결할 수는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A>메서드 (wsdl.exe 도구로 사용 됨)입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: You can also use a custom class derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter> class to extend the import process to handle custom extensibility elements.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 사용자 지정 클래스를 사용할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter>사용자 지정 확장성 요소를 처리 하 여 가져오기 프로세스를 확장 하는 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is used by the import process; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> 가져오기 프로세스에서 사용 되 고, 그러지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

When overridden in a derived class, the class returned by this property will be a derived class within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description> namespace rather than the base <xref:System.Object> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 반환 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description>기본 <xref:System.Object>클래스</xref:System.Object> 보다는 네임 스페이스</xref:System.Web.Services.Description> 내에서 파생된 클래스가 됩니다 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is necessary for the action to which it refers.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> 참조 하는 작업에 대 한 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> 고, 그러지 않으면 필요한 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
